item.title: Clip - Crop some cool images from your photo library!
item.description: Cutout Tool lets you make & share custom stickers for everyone to use. Choose an image of your closest friend or the icon you like, then clip it into a sticker! *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="Clip - Crop some cool images from your photo library!"

item.title: Custom Logo - Make your own style
item.description: You may want to remove watermark when you're editing your photo. But in PhotoGrid, you can customize your own watermark and make your own special signature! *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="Custom Logo - Make your own style"

item.title: Meme - Creating your Meme with GIF
item.description: See the video to see how to create a meme. We provide trending photo and GIFs to let our user create the funniest meme in the world! Also,You can move and resize the text boxes by dragging them around. *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="Meme - Creating your Meme with GIF"

item.title: Slide Show Maker - Share your best moments with your friends
item.description: Create slideshows with up to 50 images and add your favorite music, it's easy! Pick your photos and videos. Select your favorite filters and transitions. Choose the music from our gallery or your own songs and recordings. Save it to your camera roll and share it on Facebook, Instagram or Youtube. *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;"

item.title: Scrapbook - Personalize your photo in freestyle
item.description: Scrapbook is very easy with simple user interface and can stitch a number of pics with multiple and creative frames, stickers, and backgrounds. You can make scrapbook collage with multiple photos and backgrounds, varieties frames, emojis, multiple stickers, a huge collection of fonts, creative Filters, and more. *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="Scrapbook - Personalize your photo in freestyle"

item.title: Video Maker - Collage videos and photos
item.description: Best Instagram Video Editor and Photo Editor, add blur backgrounds with no cropping or watermarks! Add music and other effects on videos for Instagram. Merge and trim videos with effects. A professional photo editor with collage maker. *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="Video Maker - Collage videos and photos"

item.title: Smart Face Filter - Real-time Selfie camera
item.description: Make ordinary photos look fantastic with 100+ animated filter effects. Whether you're on your own, with a friend, or with however many people there are, WowCam (AR Beauty Face filter) will preserve and add magic to your wonderful moments. *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="Smart Face Filter - Real-time Selfie camera"
